about_the_game:
The story tells how the Queen of Freyja of Galentis mainland, together with 7 loyal knights and protagonists, revives the kingdom.
At the same time, Queen Freya faced Kaedsha the betrayer, a greedy empire and a terrible green-skin monster. In order to fight against the empire and Kaedsha, the kingdom had occupied most of its forces. At this time, Queen Freya remembered the former kingdom. The strongest proof is the steel sword Merrion knight of the kingdom, but he disappeared from the rebellion 10 years ago. The person who can save this situation is the champion knight Roze selected by Queen Freya herself.
lets go! Luo Ze, we have to go to the far border, look for his footprints, and let him return to the kingdom, so that the once unmatched MI7 will reappear and save our kingdom.

This is an independent game based on strategy and currently based on tower defense.
We hope to build a magnificent fantasy world with rich characters, plots and scenes.

main feature
note! This is a tower defense game!
Command your soldiers to fight in the defensive tower assembly point
Hero characters participate in battle.
6 types of towers, each tower has 4 stages to upgrade.
There are so many kinds of goblins, witness how this terrifying creature ravages the continent.
The arms technology tree can continuously improve your army's combat capabilities.

Future plans: After players' support and feedback, we expect to add new towers and troops to make the game more strategic. We hope to make games with a sense of animation substitution!
